Good game.

Es un gran juego que toca temas como la Ciencia ficción, inteligencias artificiales y la singularidad tecnológica.
El humor de Glados le da un toque especial, mas aparte de la ambientación que te hace sentir más dentro del juego.
Se disfruta de inicio a fin, y en multijugador ni se diga, es realmente entretenido. Muchos trolleos y bromas, aparte de grandes ratos que se pasa entre amigos.
Где портал три и ХФ3?
Llama a un amigo seco para los puzzles y ponte a jugar este juegaso, los niveles creados por la comunidad son increíbles y desafiantes.
i really like this game

Portal 2 é um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Com uma bela narrativa, e personagens divertidissímos, me senti imerso dentro desse universo a cada segundo de jogo. Os puzzles não são muito complicados de início, mas o nível vai aumentando, mas nunca num ponto impossível de complexidade. O modo cooperativo é um muito bom, com puzzles que achei mais complicados que no modo single player (provavelmente por eu e meu colega nunca concordarmos nas soluções). Se você pensa em comprar esse jogo, faça-o agora!

A masterpiece in gaming.
10/10 would voluntarily sign up for testing all over again.

Writing review for steam badge..don't hate me for this. Anyway buy this game even if you're not a fan of puzzle games. I was never a fan of puzzle games but this game will get you hooked before you know it. After you finished the main game, grab a friend and play co-op. It's even more fun.

Absolutely perfect, every puzzle is in the perfect place, great learning curve.
Overall, PERFECT

wasted 1 hour on a single puzzle from the community... 10/10 would do that again

听说是神作 ，买了再说

¿Qué decir sobre Portal 2?

Su antecesor era una de esas pequeñas joyas del ingenio que cada tanto aparecen en el firmamento. Una mecánica original y divertida, puzles ingeniosos y un cínico sentido del humor dejaban claro que no tenía rival... hasta que apareció Portal 2.
Si el primer juego era un patio de escuela, el segundo es un estadio olímpico. el término AAA en estado puro.
Manteniendo todo lo que hizo especial y genial a Portal, la secuela no hace sino ampliar, pulir e innovar a toda clase de aspectos tales como añadir un modo cooperativo (tanto Online como Offline) totalmente independiente.
Los personajes han pasado a la historia de los videojuegos por méritos propios, pues el carisma impregna a todos y a cada uno de ellos. ¿Quién no conoce a la mordaz GLaDOS, a las adorablemente letales torretas o al cubo de compañía?

Un "MUST HAVE" en toda regla.


P.D: El pastel es una mentira...
that's pretty good

No matter what....I keep going back to this game! The atmosphere, the characters, the game play! It has a hold on me! If you haven't played it...what are you waiting for? And when you have finished this...check out "Portal Stories: Mel" its your answer to "Hey Valve, where is Portal 3"?

What is there about this game that hasn't already been said? Honestly, if you're looking at the reviews because you're not sure if this game is good enough to buy then you really don't look into the gaming community much. This game is, at least right now, the most highly reviewed actual game on steam, and that's pretty amazing, just like this game. Seriously, if you haven't played this game, then do yourself a service and pick it up, it's easily one of my favorite games of all time.

Geniales Game.
Pflichtkauf!

Such a well made sequel to the first game. The story was funny all the way through, with puzzles that had a wide range of difficulties. Did I mention this game has one of the best co-op experiences you can have with your friends? Steam workshop support for even more puzzles. This is one of those games where you ask yourself, "Where is Portal 3?".

不只是一个 卖物理谜题的游戏  剧情感人 尤其是最后的一首歌

非常经典的一款PUZ-FPS游戏，游戏的质量和制作水准都很高。
游戏内容方面也是无可挑剔的，主线流程的难度不算高，可以轻松的解开谜题。剧情也是相当的有趣，两个机器人之间交锋，而且最后的结局说实话，在我第一次通关时确实感到很惊喜，没想过竟然还会有这样的结局，我也是没想到啊。另外想说的就是“光圈科技”那段剧情简直赞不绝口，各种神奇的凝胶非常好玩。
我推荐你连续花上几个小时来体验完全部的故事剧情，一口气通关的感受相当爽的。
想来想去也没什么能挑的刺，我个人少有的给个10/10，满分。
最后吐槽一下续作的问题，我相当相当期待portal3，但是我想就算到了2033年我也看不到portal3了吧，毕竟……（笑）
Excelente! Grande historia.
Um dos melhores jogos da valve, o conceito do game e seus portais é muito envolvente e inteligente. Diversão garantida.
Just play it! You will  love it. Just be ready to me amazed. Run and solve. Fast, agile...
这是一个需要智商(卡bug？)的基友无线死游戏。

趁着黑五写一波测评蛤，似乎只要是大片打折，V社自己的游戏总是首当其冲的。（虽然我并没有看这次打着没有）
首先，我是一个粉丝，一个传送门的粉丝。在无数的死亡和续命只后，我终于通关了这个游戏，约计12小时。之后都是打创意工坊和与老哥联机的。我买的两人包，送了一份给好基友，然而好基友沉迷于辣鸡deadgame和辣鸡屁股不能自拔。。。。现在剧情都没玩过。。
下面开始正文蛤。

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
传送门之大观也，前人之述备矣。然则北有deadgameGlados语音包，南有portal2stroiesMEI折磨身心，日呆加一，多会于此，左右双手，能不剁呼？
传送门2打起折来便宜的很，22块买两份，简直不要太少。没有机油的小伙伴可以拉我一蛤，虽然我至今没有打通过社区的实验室，辣鸡游戏。
另外，dead2的同好们，玩过portal2，还可以听glados的语音包，市场只需4块，在dead2里在被嘲讽一番岂不是美滋滋。（什么时候rick and morty打折啊。。都快第三季了）
再另外，刚刚通关portal2的萌新们可以尝试一下portalstories。Sbeam上直接搜索，良心免费，除了。。。比较难。。。


[spoiler] 另外日常催更出3！！！或者出VR，想体现下那种极致的眩晕感（虽然没有VR，也没有蚝油，但是我可以看实况啊！）[/spoiler]


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
传送门觉得称得上是神作，在我心目中算是V社游戏的第一了。（不撕。。你们说不是就不是蛤。。）比起dead2不知道高到哪里去了。（辣鸡VALVE秋天的尾巴）强烈推荐！

Bought it in the Valve bundle. 
If I recall correctly I think I did finished playing it on steam.
Before that I played the pirated version when I was 15. 
Played the pirated version twice.
Bought it so that I can play Co-op.
But my friend still haven't bought it.
Love the single player although can be a bit challenging.
Love the story and ending.
And characters.
And game mechanic.
And song.
I rate this game 3/2.
